Reviews.Title: great value for the price
Reviews.Author: tina
Reviews.Content: I am a beginner photogragher wanting to step it up a notch.  This seems to be a great camera for this. This camera and kit was also priced to sell.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) + <2> Nikon 55-200mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Battery Grip for D5100 & D5200 +
<4> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case + <5> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <6> Spare EN-EL14 Battery + <7> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<8> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <9> Additional Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <10> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <11> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens +
<12> HB-45 Lens Hood + <13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <15> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) with 55-200mm VR Lens + 64GB Card + Case + Grip & Battery + Tripod + Tele/Wide Lenses + Filters Kit
